TopicTitle: Great! Just updated and my save file has gone.

Articles.Content:
Cant even begin to describe my disappointment.

Been playing the game for weeks if not months, career going well.  Update comes along so yesterday I install it.  Then play it, with no issues.

Come to play it today and my save file has completely gone.

I can see a 5 KB save file under my xbox profile.  Deleted, as advised, and sync occurred - file returned but with no save game accessible from the menu.

Yeah, if this can't be fixed I'm done. 

GT is SloppyClock on Xbox One.

I do get your frustration, but as PS4 player I would gladly restart my science mode game today if it meant I didn't have to worry about future saves being corrupted.  Then again a big part of my experience has been learning the game, so starting over and doing things 'right' to an extent doesn't sound that bad anyway.
